message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. After careful consideration, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this exceptional product to you for $1500000. This price reflects not only the value of the product but also our commitment to providing you with the best possible experience. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think the price is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you're offering, and I'm willing to make a compromise to close the deal.
